chapters.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Generative AI
chapters.description: In this chapter, we'll introduce you to the world of generative AI and how it's changing the way we interact with technology.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: First AI App
chapters.description: In this chapter, we'll build our first AI app using OpenAI's GPT-3 model.

chapters.title: Chapter 3: Prompt Engineering
chapters.description: In this chapter, we'll learn how to craft prompts that get the best results from our AI models.

chapters.title: Chapter 4: Structured output
chapters.description: In this chapter, we'll learn how to structure the output of our AI models to make them more useful.

chapters.title: Chapter 5: RAG in Action
chapters.description: In this chapter, we'll learn how to use the RAG pattern to ground our AI models in real-world knowledge.
